tool_description: You can use https://ipwhois.io/ to filter out bot traffic, customize content based on visitor's location, display full country names, perform bulk IP geolocation, and more.
title: IP Geolocation - IPWHOIS.io

api_list.name: JSON endpoint
api_list.description: Detailed information on our website: https://ipwhois.io/documentation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-geolocation-ipwhois-io.p.rapidapi.com/json/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-geolocation-ipwhois-io.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: {ip} can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address, or none to use the current IP address.

utterances.utterance: What is the geolocation information for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
Can you provide details about the IP address 8.8.8.8?
Find the location data for the IP address 2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334.
Get geolocation information for my current IP address.
What country is the IP address 123.45.67.89 located in?
Can you tell me the city for the IP address 172.16.254.1?
Provide the geolocation details for the IP address 2607:f0d0:1002:51::4.
Where is the IP address 203.0.113.0 located?
Get the geolocation for the IP address 198.51.100.0.
What is the region and country for the IP address 192.0.2.0?
